question: In which season did Bursaspor win the Süper Lig championship?
asked_question_translated: V ktorej sezóne získal Bursaspor titul majstra Süper Lig?
answer: Bursaspor získal titul majstra Süper Lig v sezóne 2009-2010.
answer_translated_eng: Bursaspor won the Süper Lig title in the 2009-2010 season.
